title: Enhancing Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Adaptive E-Learning for Strengthening Workplace Mathematics Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply basic statistical concepts (mean, standard deviation, regression analysis) with 85% accuracy for business data analysis.
Learners can build optimization models using foundational linear algebra (matrix operations, vector concepts) to solve workplace problems.
Learners can diagnose individual weak areas via an automated assessment system in e-learning modules and complete personalized learning paths with over 90% completion rates.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
